column1: 2024-12-30,The Criterion Challenge 2025,"cc2025, criterion challenge 2025, criterion, challenge, 2025",https://boxd.it/BLZqs,"Welcome to the fifth annual Criterion Challenge, hosted by Ben and featuring his original list, where we celebrate The Criterion Collection!

There are 52 categories. The goal is to watch any Criterion released film based on the categories below between 1/1/25-12/31/25. The films can be watched daily, weekly, or monthly, and in any order. Watch them at your own pace, but remember you have to finish by 12/31/25.
In my first participation here, I'll try to ensure that all the films are first-time watches, except for two or three, but this is subject to change if they are difficult to access.
Don't forget to visit The Criterion Collection for all your film needs!

This number will change as more releases are announced so please keep up to date by using the link I have provided as I will not be updating each time Criterion makes announcements. Watch whatever movie corresponds to the spine number you are given.) - Thelma & Louise #1180
